title: R-matrices of U_qOSP(1,2) for highest weight representations of U_qOSP(1,2) for general q and q is an odd root of unity
abstract: We obtain the formula for intertwining operator(R-matrix) of quantum universal enveloping superalgebra U_qOSP(1,2) for U_qOSP(1,2)-Verma modules. By its restriction we obtain the R-matrix for two semiperiodic(semicyclic), two spin-j and spin-j and semiperiodic representations
